SENT.plain: Moyamoya syndrome has rarely been reported in association with Down syndrome
We report a case of an 11-year-old female child with Down syndrome who presented with hemiparesis and facial palsy
Imaging investigations (magnetic resonance angiography and digital subtraction angiography) revealed the classical Moyamoya pattern
Work-up for prothrombotic and autoimmune disorders was negative
The association of Moyamoya syndrome in patients with Down syndrome has been highlighted
The possible causes for the association and management have been reviewed briefly
